text: The article shows major mechanisms for development of left ventricular dysfunction in patients with hypertensive heart and provides major trends in the treatment of heart failure with preserved ejection fraction in the light of state-of-the art in its pathogenesis.
title: [Left ventricular dysfunction in hypertensive heart: Current view of the pathogenesis and treatment].
